SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AnsiColors
Provides ANSI color codes for console output.
Cell
The Cell class represents an individual cell in the minefield, contains state and mine information.
CellState
The CellState enum represents the visual state of cell, provides state transitions for flagging and revealing operations.
CLIHandler
Handles the command-line interface for the Minesweeper game.
Command
The Command class represents a user command.
CommandParser
The CommandParser class parses user input strings into Command objects.
CommandParser.CommandParsingException
The CommandParsingException is the class of the exception thrown when command parsing fails.
CommandType
The CommandType enumeration defines the available command types that can be executed
DefaultMineFieldFactory
The DefaultMineFieldFactory class implements the MineFieldFactory interface to create instances of MineField with specified dimensions and mine count.
Difficulty
The Difficulty enum defines the three difficulty levels, each with predefined grid dimensions and mine counts.
DisplayManager
Manages the display output for the Minesweeper game.
FlagOperation
The FlagOperation class implements the GameOperation interface to handle flagging and unflagging cells in a Minesweeper game.
FlagRules
The FlagRules class implements the GameRules interface to validate flagging operations in a Minesweeper game.
Game
The Game class represents a Minesweeper game instance.
Game.InvalidGameOperationException
Exception thrown when an invalid game operation is attempted.
GameOperation
The GameOperation interface defines a contract for operations that can be performed on a Minesweeper game, such as revealing or flagging cells.
GameRules
The GameRules interface defines a contract for validating game operations in a Minesweeper game.
GameStatistics
Tracks and manages game statistics for a Minesweeper game, including mine count, revealed cells, flag placements, and win conditions.
GameStatus
Represents the possible states of a Minesweeper game.
GameStatusManager
Manages and controls the state transitions of a Minesweeper game.
GridDimension
The GridDimension record defines the dimensions a minefield grid.
InputManager
Manages user input for the Minesweeper game.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the Minesweeper game application.
Messages
Utility class containing all static messages and formatting strings for the Minesweeper game.
MineField
The MineField class manages the grid of cells, mine placement, and adjacency calculations.
MineFieldFactory
The DefaultMineFieldFactory class implements the MineFieldFactory interface to create instances of MineField with specified dimensions and mine count.
Position
The Position record represents a coordinate pair (row, col) on the minefield grid.
RevealOperation
The RevealOperation class implements the GameOperation interface to handle revealing cells in a Minesweeper game.
RevealRules
The RevealRules class implements the GameRules interface to validate reveal operations in a Minesweeper game.
Timer
A utility class for measuring elapsed time in milliseconds.
